languages.text: "Подтверждаю. Я не наблюдаю его лица, но узнаю его слова. "Да будет прерван Цикл" — это девиз благословенного Амарната".
"Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."
languages.original_text: "Подтверждаю. Я не наблюдаю его лица, но узнаю его слова. "Да будет прерван Цикл" — это девиз благословенного Амарната".

traits.locale_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

"Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

languages.text: "Bestätigt. Ich observiere nicht sein Gesicht, doch ich erkenne seine Worte. 'Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde' ist das Motto des gesegneten Amarnats."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

traits.locale_text: "Bestätigt. Ich observiere nicht sein Gesicht, doch ich erkenne seine Worte. 'Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde' ist das Motto des gesegneten Amarnats."

languages.text: « Affirmatif. Je ne vois pas son visage, mais je reconnais ses paroles. "Que le cycle soit rompu" est sa maxime. »
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. Je ne vois pas son visage, mais je reconnais ses paroles. "Que le cycle soit rompu" est sa maxime. »

languages.text: “已确认。我看不清他的脸，但我记得他的言语。‘让循环终止’是蒙福者阿玛纳特的座右铭。”
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

traits.locale_text: “已确认。我看不清他的脸，但我记得他的言语。‘让循环终止’是蒙福者阿玛纳特的座右铭。”

languages.text: 「確認した。男の顔はよく分からないが、あの言葉には覚えがあります。『サイクルを停止せよ』という言葉は、祝福されたアマルナトの銘だ」
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

traits.locale_text: 「確認した。男の顔はよく分からないが、あの言葉には覚えがある。『サイクルを停止せよ』という言葉は、祝福されたアマルナトの銘だ」

languages.text: «Confirmado. No veo su rostro, pero reconozco sus palabras. "Que se interrumpa el Ciclo" es el lema del bendito Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

traits.locale_text: «Confirmado. No veo su rostro, pero reconozco sus palabras. "Que se interrumpa el Ciclo" es el lema del bendito Amarnat».

languages.text: "Doğrulandı. Yüzünü göremesem de sözlerine aşinayım. 'Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun', kutsanmış Amarnat'ın düsturudur."
languages.original_text: "Confirmed. I do not observe his face, but I recognise his words. 'Let the Cycle be discontinued' is the blessed Amarnat's motto."

traits.locale_text: "Onaylıyorum. Yüzünü göremesem de sözlerine aşinayım. 'Süregelen Döngü son bulsun', kutsanmış Amarnat'ın özdeyişidir."
